gov.nasa.jpf.search

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.search.Search
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DFSearch, HeuristicSearch, PathSearch, RandomSearch, Simulation

    public abstract class Search
extends Object
    the mother of all search classes. Mostly takes care of listeners, keeping track of state attributes and errors. This class mainly keeps the general search info like depth, configured properties etc.

        protected SearchListener[] listeners
        search listeners. We keep them in a simple array to avoid creating objects on each notification

        protected Reporter reporter
        this is a special SearchListener that is always notified last, so that PublisherExtensions can be sure the notification has been processed by all listeners

      • requestBacktrack

        public boolean requestBacktrack()
        this is somewhat redundant to SystemState.setIgnored(), but we don't want to mix the case of overriding state matching with backtracking when searching for multiple errors

      • checkStateSpaceLimit

        public boolean checkStateSpaceLimit()
        check if we have a minimum amount of free memory left. If not, we rather want to stop in time (with a threshold amount left) so that we can report something useful, and not just die silently with a OutOfMemoryError (which isn't handled too gracefully by most VMs)
